description:
look i will admit this lacks in a few features but its a WIP (work in progress) and is very user friendly, its a beautiful app but it's not reached its full potential.. though i really like it and hope it will be workedon and developed to the point where i can use it as my main music player.. i will like to suggest one feature

- add an AI that could detect the dong based on its name and artist and find all the musics Tags including Images in order to Autotag all your songs And improve convinience 300%

But that's all keep up the good work!
Una porquería... no funciona, solo sale un letrero "coming soon"
dommage car jolie look,et les fonctions sont sympa mais;pas de son;copie à revoir !...
